MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA4 postcode area of Renfrew. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. We now expect your supply to be restored by Midnight. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.23PM on 23rd February 2021.
